attributes.action: Keep gyms open if tier 5 lockdown is introduced in England
attributes.additional_details: Exercise releases endorphins. Endorphins make you feel better after you have exercised.
attributes.background: Many people rely on going to the gym for exercise. By keeping them closed in Tier 4 and 5 if introduced, the government is limiting opportunities to exercise and therefore affecting health and wellbeing. Therefore we are asking the government to keep gyms open in every tier that's introduced.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869
